headline: Keysight and KT SAT Achieve Industry-First Multi-Orbit NTN Handover Between GEO Satellite and Emulated LEO Link
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., December 11, 2025--Live multi-orbit proof-of-concept shows session continuity from a geostationary earth orbit to an emulated low Earth orbit link.

headline: Do Vodafone 5G Win and AI FieldFox Launch Might Change The Case For Investing In Keysight Technologies (KEYS)
summary: Earlier this month, Vodafone disclosed that Keysight Technologies’ Spirent Communications unit is powering a new automated 5G software testing platform that cuts core network upgrade times from months to days across its pan‑European mobile voice networks. This follows Keysight’s launch of the N99xxD-Series FieldFox handheld analyzers with AI-enhanced wideband RF analysis, underscoring its push into higher-value software and data-centric test solutions. We’ll now examine how Keysight’s...
